name: KubernetesManifest
description: Use Kubernetes manifest files to deploy to clusters or even bake the manifest files to be used for deployments using Helm charts
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=851275) or [see the Kubernetes documentation](https://kubernetes.io/docs/home/)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the action to be performed.

inputs.name: kubernetesServiceConnection
inputs.label: Kubernetes service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Kubernetes service connection.

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.label: Namespace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the namespace for the commands by using the â€“namespace flag. If the namespace is not provided, the commands will run in the default namespace.

inputs.name: strategy
inputs.label: Strategy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deployment strategy to be used
inputs.visibleRule: action = deploy || action = promote || action = reject

inputs.name: trafficSplitMethod
inputs.label: Traffic split method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Traffic split method to be used

inputs.name: percentage
inputs.label: Percentage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Percentage of traffic redirect to canary deployment

validation.message: Enter valid percentage value i.e between 0 to 100.

inputs.name: baselineAndCanaryReplicas
inputs.label: Baseline and canary replicas
inputs.helpMarkDown: Baseline and canary replicas count
inputs.visibleRule: strategy = Canary && action = deploy && trafficSplitMethod = SMI

validation.message: Enter valid value for baseline and canary replica count.

inputs.name: manifests
inputs.label: Manifests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Manifests to deploy
inputs.visibleRule: action = deploy || action = promote || action = reject

inputs.name: containers
inputs.label: Containers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Containers
inputs.visibleRule: action = deploy || action = promote || action = bake

inputs.name: imagePullSecrets
inputs.label: ImagePullSecrets
inputs.helpMarkDown: ImagePullSecret to pull image from private registry

inputs.name: renderType
inputs.label: Render Engine
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tool to use for generating manifest files.

inputs.name: dockerComposeFile
inputs.label: Path to docker compose file
inputs.helpMarkDown: docker-compose file path

inputs.name: helmChart
inputs.label: Helm Chart
inputs.helpMarkDown: Helm chart path to bake

inputs.name: releaseName
inputs.label: Helm Release Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Helm release name to use

inputs.name: overrideFiles
inputs.label: Override Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override files to set

inputs.name: overrides
inputs.label: Overrides
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override values to set

inputs.name: kustomizationPath
inputs.label: Kustomization Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The argument must be the path to the directory containing the file, or a git repository URL with a path suffix specifying same with respect to the repository root.

inputs.name: resourceToPatch
inputs.label: Resource to patch
inputs.helpMarkDown: to identify the resource

inputs.name: resourceFileToPatch
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file used for patch

inputs.name: kind
inputs.label: Kind
inputs.helpMarkDown: Kind of K8s object; deployment, replicaSet etc.

inputs.name: name
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the k8s object

inputs.name: replicas
inputs.label: Replica count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of replicas to scale to

inputs.name: mergeStrategy
inputs.label: Merge Strategy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of patch being provided; one of [json merge strategic]

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments for `kubectl delete` command

inputs.name: patch
inputs.label: Patch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Contents of patch

inputs.name: secretType
inputs.label: Type of secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create/update a generic or docker imagepullsecret. Select dockerRegistry to create/update the imagepullsecret of the selected registry. An imagePullSecret is a way to pass a secret that contains a container registry password to the Kubelet so it can pull a private image on behalf of your Pod.

inputs.name: secretName
inputs.label: Secret name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the secret. You can use this secret name in the Kubernetes YAML configuration file.

inputs.name: secretArguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify keys and literal values to insert in secret.For example, --from-literal=key1=value1 --from-literal=key2="top secret".

inputs.name: dockerRegistryEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker registry service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker registry service connection. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: rolloutStatusTimeout
inputs.label: Timeout for rollout status
inputs.helpMarkDown: The length of time (in seconds) to wait before ending watch on rollout status
inputs.visibleRule: action = deploy || action = patch || action = scale || action = promote

validation.message: Enter a valid value for timeout.

outputVariables.name: manifestsBundle
outputVariables.description: The location of the manifest bundles created by bake action
